text: Adolfo John Canepa, CMG, OBE, GMH (born 17 December 1940)Events, deaths, births, of 17 DEC is a Gibraltarian politician. He was the Leader of the Opposition. He was the Chief Minister of Gibraltar from 8 December 1987 to 25 March 1988. He was also the leader of the Association for the Advancement of Civil Rights (AACR). ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Chief Ministers of Gibraltar Category:Politicians from London Category:Mayors of Gibraltar
title: Adolfo Canepa
